nodes.text: Kayderr was a friend of Obi-Wan Kenobi who was killed by an Imperial agent sent by Darth Vader during the Galactic Civil War.
In Star Wars Galaxies, Kayderr's gender, species, and appearance would fluctuate after each quest. The quest dialogue did not specify any physical aspects of Kayderr.
Though not mentioned in the quest dialogue, examining Kayderr revealed Kayderr to be a mercenary.
